name: UCommonAnimatedSwitcher
doc: A widget switcher that activates / deactivates CommonActivatableWidgets, allowing for associated animations to trigger.

OnActiveWidgetIndexChangedBP: Fires when the active widget displayed by the switcher changes
TransitionType: The type of transition to play between widgets
TransitionCurveType: The curve function type to apply to the transition animation
TransitionDuration: The total duration of a single transition between widgets
TransitionFallbackStrategy: Controls how we will choose another widget if a transitioning widget is removed during the transition.

methods.name: IsTransitionPlaying
methods.doc: Is the switcher playing a transition animation?
